answers.answer: I got pregnant after having a tube removed.
it is possible though unlikely.there are cases of peoples tubes growing back together, but that is usually just with people who had it done pretty young.people have gotten the procedure reversed
My friend got pregnant after getting her tubes tied. I thought maybe she got pregnant before she got them tied but nope it was for sure after.
I had my tubes tied back in 2001 and now pregnant with my second set of twins
I had mine tied and clamped I'm 30 weeks pregnantwith my third daughter at age 37. GGood luck I was surely shocked!

my mama had a friend she used to work with who had 3 kids and wanted her tubes tied and cut.. well, she had it done & she got pregnant with her 4th.then, she had them cut, tied, and burned. well, she got pregnant with her 5th lol! so I think she finally just had them removed.. they don't work together anymore, but who knows.. she probably got pregnant again haha!

Thank you all! I know someone who did...but when you find yourself in thst situation of wondering if they have grown back its a different story!! For those who did....was it detectable on a urine test or did you have to have bloodwork? In all the research I have done over the past week it said that many will not show on a urine test until 4-6 months and that they had to have the bloodwork to find out. Thanks for yalls help!!

My aunt has 7 kids... the 5th was a birth control baby (pill), 6th was a deprovera baby. She got her tubes tied after #6--- she went on a chemotherapy drug (for lupus) and the #1 ingredient is also the #1 ingredient  the morning after pill... and she still got pregnant with #7... she ended up getting really bad preeclampsia and toxemia and was forced to deliver at 24 weeks...
My mom had hers done almost 23 years ago when she was 21 after almost dying with my sister. She has been pregnant and miscarried four times since.

My doctor's nurse warned me about getting my tubes tied (and burnt) the same day that I deliver. She said your uterus goes trough rapid healing after child birth making it really a bad time to do a tubal ligation. You have increased chance of your tubes healing as well. I'm still doing it because I'd like to kill two birds with one stone. If I get pregnant I'm gonna take it as God's will for me.
I think Im going to try to go to the dr on Monday if nothing shows up between now and then and have them run some test. Better safe than sorry!!
And I was 20 when mine were tied.

Ok....so a littl update...I went to the dr today. They have sent off a bunch of labs to see whats going on with me. Im now 5 days late and still nauseous.....have been for almost 2 weeks. She wants me to rest over the weekend and is suppposed to call me over the weekend when labs are back.
Oh gosh! Good luck... How many kids do you have already?
No dont tell me that lol im worried now! I got pregnant on the pill and im getting my tubes burnt after my c section! Im not tryna have 5 kids lol
I had tubes cut, tied and burned after no 4 in 2008.....guess what?? 4 wks 1 day with no. 5 and in TOTAL shock

I have 2...my dd is 10 and my ds is 8!! I am on bedrest til the labs come back. If positive O have to have an emergency ultrasound to check if its in the tubes or not. Guess she didnt want to chance me rupturing if I am and its tubal!
At least I dont feel so alone now...lol

question: Has anyone here become pregnant after a tubal ligation?
title: pregnant after a tubal ligation?
